com.googlecode.sarasvati.env
Interface TokenSetMemberEnv

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTokenSetMemberEnv, HibTokenSetMemberEnv, MemTokenSetMemberEnv
public interface TokenSetMemberEnv

Similar to Env, except that attributes can be tied to the specific member index of a token set member.

Author:
Paul Lorenz

setAttribute

void setAttribute(String name,
                  List<?> values)
Sets the values for the given attribute name on each memberIndex. Values in the list past the number of member indices will be ignored.

Parameters:
name - The attribute name
values - The list of values to set, one per memberIndex

removeAttribute

void removeAttribute(int memberIndex,
                     String name)
See Also:
Env.removeAttribute(String)

removeAttribute

void removeAttribute(String name)
Removes the given attribute from all member indices.

Parameters:
name - The attribute to remove
